(Oh yeah, who killed the most people?  Me, oh my god I am that damn good.  If 
anyone deletes that site they'll answer to me.  That's the only history left 
from the time this RPG was actually good.  Erasing it would be like spitting 
in all the faces of those of us who made the RPG good.  And I for one kick 
everyone's ass who spits in my face ;)
